name: Knock Knock (TooMuch2Do)
description:
A simple simulation game in an attempt to ignite the child within.

Experience a night of Trick or Treating as you walk through he neighborhood and visit all the houses.  Be careful of the older kids looking to take your candy!  You can hide from them, but they're always lurking somewhere.

[HOW TO PLAY]
Player Controls  =  W A S D
Hide in Bushes  =  Space Bar
Shoot Targets  =  Mouse & Left Click

A TM2D Production:
Steven French - Coding & Game Design
Zack Martin - Graphics & Game Design
